definition: 4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to apply (for a job)/to reply to a job advertisement
omen/sign (that sth is about to happen)/warning sign

sentences.english: This picture is a rare example of "vanishing twin syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 這張圖見證了罕見的“雙胎消失徵”。

sentences.english: Murphy sign of ultrasound was positive.
Conclusion The ground glass and honeycomb sign usually point out the diagnosis of bron…
sentences.chinese: 結論磨玻璃徵和蜂窩徵往往提示肺泡癌的診斷。

sentences.english: Results The CT feature of spondylolysis was loop-broken sign.
sentences.chinese: 結果峽部裂的特徵性CT表現爲“環裂徵”。

sentences.english: B CT scan of the lower abdomen shows beaking and collapsed bowel loops at the retrocecal recess.
sentences.chinese: 下腹部CT掃描顯示盲腸後隱窩處腸管塌陷呈鳥嘴徵。

sentences.english: The wealthy gorgeous recruited the co-habit to watch the World Cup with the salary of 1000 Yuan a day, what is your opinion?
sentences.chinese: 富二代美女日薪千元徵同居男看世界盃，你怎樣看？

sentences.english: Drafts takes the forest land is one of forest resources management important contents.
sentences.chinese: 徵佔用林地是森林資源管理的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of inferior oblique muscles weakening on V pattern esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討下斜肌減弱術對內斜視V徵治療效果。

sentences.english: We should levy a heavy tax on the wealthy men.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該向富人徵重稅。

sentences.english: During the war, a number of young men were recruited into the mining industry.
sentences.chinese: 戰時，一批年輕人被徵從事開採業。

sentences.english: Strict management will be exercised over the use of forestland, and requisitioning of forestland will be blocked for one year.
sentences.chinese: 要嚴格實施林地用途管制，凍結徵佔用林地一年。

sentences.english: This important clinical finding is known as Kussmaul's sign.
sentences.chinese: 這一重要臨牀發現被稱爲庫斯毛爾氏徵。

sentences.english: The old man's son was not drafted because he was crippled and so his life was spared.
sentences.chinese: 老人的兒子，因爲殘廢沒有被徵，因而得以平安無事。

sentences.english: There are signs of consolidation if a large area of lung is involved.
sentences.chinese: 如果一大片肺被侵犯則有實變徵。

sentences.english: Addison's is treatable with lifelong steroid replacement therapy.
sentences.chinese: 終生運用類固醇替補療法能治療艾迪生氏徵。

sentences.english: CT scan reveals bilateral lower lobe consolidation with air bronchograms.
sentences.chinese: CT掃描顯示雙側肺下葉實變以及充氣支氣管徵。

definition: historian from Song of the Southern Dynasties 南朝宋, author of History of Eastern Han 後漢書|后汉书
The Artificer's Record, a technology treaty compiled towards the end of the Spring and Autumn period
(old) candidate who has successfully passed the first grades of the examination system, but not yet the court examination (殿試|殿试[dian4 shi4])
Mr Gongyang's Annals or commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history, probably written by multiple authors during Han dynasty, same as 公羊春秋[Gong1 yang2 Chun1 qiu1]
Extensive records of the Taiping era (978), fictional history edited by Li Fang 李昉
variant of 弦/bow string/string of musical instrument/watch spring/chord (straight line joining two points on a curve)/hypotenuse
Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty
official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
to sacrifice one's life by loyalty (to one's prince, one's husband etc)

same as 舊唐書|旧唐书[Jiu4 Tang2 shu1], History of the Early Tang Dynasty, sixteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Liu Xu 劉昫|刘昫[Liu2 Xu4] in 945 during Later Jin 後晉|后晋[Hou4 Jin4] of the Five Dynasties, 200 scrolls
Gan county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州, Jiangxi
